decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of  five years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. | Detailed drawings or samples of materials, as appropriate, in respect of the following, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing prior to commencement of the work: (a)  external joinery details of conservatory (elevations and section) at a scale of not less than 1:20, (b)  balcony railings (elevations and sections) at a scale of not less than 1:20, (c)  sliding doors at ground floor level etc. Such details shall be implemented only in accordance with the drawings as approved.  REASON: To safeguard the special architectural or historic interest of the building. | The conservatory hereby permitted shall be timber framed, single glazed, and white painted and so maintained.  REASON:  To protect the character and appearance of the building which is statutorily listed.
description: Internal/external alterations and extensions to single family dwellinghouse to include replacement of existing conservatory in the rear lightwell area, extension of dormer window at first floor level and enclosure of flat roof to form a balcony at first floor level and conversion of a garage into a store/utility room
